about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of skufs and altushkas! In this game, it's not the skufs who have to look for altushki, but the altushki of the skufs.

Features:

  • Overcoming obstacles: You will have to complete three levels, avoiding falling into the abyss and demonstrating excellent reaction and dexterity.

  • Destroy of structures: Realistic destruction physics will allow you to have fun and spectacularly destroy various objects built on levels.

  • Freedom to choose levels: All levels are immediately available for completion, without the need to complete them sequentially. This allows you to experiment and choose which path to take first.

  • Real altushki: At each level you will meet altushki who will watch you pass the level.

Join the world where the skufs will become heroes again, and show what you are capable of! This game is for those who are looking for exciting adventures with cute altushki.

name: Skuf for altushki

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the world of skufs and altushkas! In this game, it's not the skufs who have to look for altushki, but the altushki of the skufs.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
